website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, reasonably priced floating hammock that is designed for leisurely days in the pool.
pros: This floating hammock features the popular design of a head pillow and a knee pillow, but it also comes with a small hand pump to help you with inflation
The durable material is rated to support up to a 265-pound person in the water
cons: Inspect your floating hammock upon receiving as sometimes a defective model may slip through quality control

customer_reviews.title: Great float!!!
customer_reviews.text: Brought these on our vacation to Jamaica. They came in SO handy in the pool and in the ocean. People asked us where we got them from - everyone wished they had brought some! Saw a couple with the ones that have the 2 inflatable pieces that are actually a part of the float - For this one you put the plastic inflatable penis inside of the sleeve first, then inflate it. I think this one is better because if you get a hole in the inflatable part your whole flow isn’t ruined, you can just get a replacement inflatable peace.
customer_reviews.author: Kris10Rose

customer_reviews.title: Simple is better!
customer_reviews.text: When you look at all the floating chairs, mats and lounges at ridiculous prices, yes they’re nice and great looking. But for me and my husband who like to float around to cool off after a hot round of golf here in the desert, these are perfect. You can lie on them like a lounge, or sit in them like a chair. They look nice in their bright stripe colors. You could buy ten of these for the price of one floating lounge. I have had a few of them for two years and bought more this year, and they still are fine which is almost a miracle here in a Phoenix summer. A great value for a small price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Float Like Royalty
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is the best of the design. There are a few lesser cost floating hammocks, but this is money well spent. The mesh is high quality and the float design is a multi piece individual tube insert, top and bottom, with cord locked drawstrings. Much sturdier than other 1 piece hammock floats
customer_reviews.author: MANIMAL

customer_reviews.title: Nice float
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the pool. My fiancé wanted something he could rest his head on while floating. This was perfect. Easily transportable and storable since the pillows deflate. One pillow had a leak so we did have to do a return, but the service was great and we received the replacement quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brown dog

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun... when it arrives undamged - Theyt send two airpumps... they are useless.
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered this and one of them arrived with obvious faulty stitching that, in my opinion, should have been caught during packaging... I sent in for exchange and the new ones were perfect. They are comfy. I sometime put less air in one or both of the airpillows so that I can adjust how submerged I am in the water... I might be a control freak :-) ... Forget using the airpump(s).. it is so weak and slow. I blew it up with my mouth in like 15 seconds. If I was the manufacturer I would save money on manufacturing and leave the pump out of it.
customer_reviews.author: EARLDOGLB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Float
customer_reviews.text: These floats work out really well for sitting in the pool. Most rafts you have to lay down on and these you can sit on in two positions and they stay a float. You can lay on them as well, but I like to sit on them. I can stay on it for hours without any discomfort. The fabric is very sturdy. Definitely worth the money and they store easy as well. Just deflate the floats and fold the whole thing up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lindeman

customer_reviews.title: Never got to use-didn’t hold air
customer_reviews.text: One tube didn’t hold air so I can’t judge usability/comfort but I can attest that the quality of the inflatable tubes are thin. You MUST insert the deflated tube inside the pocket BEFORE inflating, otherwise it’s impossible to insert the tube inside the fabric pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Pberry

customer_reviews.title: Lake Float
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the lake - it deflated easily and can be stored on a boat no problem. The only reason it lost a star is because it smells SO funky! I used it all day in the lake and it still has a weird smell. Kind of like that mildew smell when you leave your clothes in the washer too long...
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great floaties
customer_reviews.text: These hammocks are fantastic for hanging out in the water. They are easy to blow up and fold nicely when not in use. I like that you can sit on them in a number of different ways. I was looking for a flotation device that would allow me to be partially in the water to stay cool and these did exactly that. I would recommend to anyone that has those same goals.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda in ND

customer_reviews.title: work great for this 270 pound man
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't think these would be this nice and useful. After 3 days in the pool for hours and hours, these ROCK!!! I'd buy them again. They really couldn't be easier to use. The hand pump is weak, but the bladders' are easy to blow up by mouth. I'm also use you could cut and use noodles too. Will be easy to pack for flights also.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin E

customer_reviews.title: The best way to use these...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets. One for me and my sister and one for her two teens. The teens were "too cool" to get in the water at the beach so me and my sister used two each and crossed them to make a square and lord, if that wasn't the most comfortable floaty I've ever been on. I'm 5'11 260lbs and it supported me easily. Your body is still in the water but your head, arms and legs are comfortably supported. Buy extras. Make boats. Trust me. Tip: Put the floaties in the raft part before you blow them up. They fit SNUG.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica washburn

customer_reviews.title: Water Hammock...great FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hammock! I used it for the first time at a pool party for me & my sis-in-law & niece & we all had fun trying it out. Thankfully one of them figured out that the pockets/pillows were different sized before I got too frustrated trying to stuff the large pillow into the smaller pocket! It's great fun & looks like it's well-made. I love the fact that it includes a (floatable!) mini air-pump...so handy! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought an Intek 10' pool this summer and this is perfect for a relaxing float on a hot Florida day! Great support for my head and legs, & easy to get in/out of. Very lightweight but well made. Loved that it came with the inflator too. Super happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Float
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these at a friend’s pool and had to have one. They are perfect for lounging in the pool and staying cool on a hot day. Super comfortable with the head and knee rolls. And the mesh allows you to be in the water still. I plan to take these as a float on the lake as well when we go out on the jet ski. Only issue I had, is that when I pulled the cord on the end of the roll, trying to get the roll in better, it ripped one of the little sleeves that hold it. So just be gentle with those .
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Best

customer_reviews.title: Review after using 1 month!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these very recently, I was able to take these to the ocean yesterday and we had so much fun! It's easy to paddle out and you stay nice and cool because you aren't completely out of the water. This holds some good weight too. Amended after one month of using! Both small floats leak air around the stem, I don't want to send them back, I just want the 2 floats replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I loved just laying back and relaxing in my pool. It's easy to put in the pool where others are bulky and heavy. It's easy to get on and off of. I use it for PT for my knee as well. I sit on it with the floats in front and back of me and paddle my feet. Helps my knee so much. Love it so much I'm ordering one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hubmann

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product with one negative.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Comfortable, versatile, easy to store, pack/travel. One negative is the fabric that secures the drawstrings “decomposes” very quickly and falls apart making a mess. Float still works well, it’s just not as nice looking without the ends cinched up. Mfg. should use the same fabric as bed to secure drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: Bow Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great floatie but flimsy pump
customer_reviews.text: We really loved it and it was easy to bring with on vacation. The only thing is that the pump broke on first use. It was a flimsy one for sure but still - so be careful when using it. Would have given 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rodica

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and price. Great sellers.
customer_reviews.text: Had a small problem with one of the inflatable tubes, but the seller immediately corrected after 1 message to them. Great seller to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great float for lazy days at the lake or pool!
customer_reviews.text: Soo easy to use and to move into different positions on the float while in the water! They don't take up much storage space in out boathouse, even when unflated.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Floats!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Material is stiffer mesh than expected. Not super comfortable. A bit bulky when inflated. Hammack area is larger than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Boy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: it fell apart at the seams - purchased in the winter and just took it out of the box today so the 30 day warranty is out. At least we know what NOT to buy - Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made junk!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible junk which fell apart within the first month. Not only did this raft fall apart, as the fibers unwound and disintegrated into the pool, they blocked the filter and made the water cloudy. This raft was only used by adults, so the poor performance was not due to misuse. Cheap junk, buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Fink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Float
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and the compact way you can store it makes it perfect for travel. We use them on the lake and never have a problem. Everyone wants to use them, and find out how to get one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kladek

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I can sit on it and have arm rest's or lay and have my body in the water. Perfect pool float.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pepin

customer_reviews.title: ... these to use at the lake and they are awesome! Everyone wanted to sit in these rather than ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use at the lake and they are awesome! Everyone wanted to sit in these rather than their regular floats. I'll be buying a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: cks

customer_reviews.title: Wanted for off the boat but nope
customer_reviews.text: Pump did not inflate bladders. Then thinking about this, it is better in a pool not to be used with the boat
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this floaty. So far nothing is wrong with it. It sets me a little lower in the pool, but that is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Knzim

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock float!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hammock float. So easy to get on and off, and very comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Vann

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this seat. Confortable in the water Glad it bring the manual pump
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Head rest busted after a couple weeks in pool.I was disappointed I liked it when it worked
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wanted to float but also be wet at the same time. Very comfortable. Pillows blow up easily. Only thing missing is a cup holder. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ficara

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Easy to get working, you can use them in multiple configurations, whether laying down or sitting. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TTL1000

customer_reviews.title: So well made!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so well made and I have no doubt that they will last for years! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JPow

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: As described and worked well in our pool on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Gores

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but it looks well made. The fabric looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: K Case

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to inflate with the enclosed pump. Very comfortable to either sit, or lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Deane

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 16’ swim spa, not overly big and 2or more can use them separately to float around spa
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit

customer_reviews.title: Floatie inserts would not hold air
customer_reviews.text: Floaties did not pump up so never got the chance to use on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fiske

customer_reviews.title: Great lake raft
customer_reviews.text: Great Lake floats. Great for sitting or laying, very bouyant
customer_reviews.author: Wainette

customer_reviews.title: Rad
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack and inflate if you are hiking in far to a lake.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Quality control was certainly lacking. Poorly constructed. It probably would have been smarter to send it back but kids were looking forward to trying it out so I chose to resew the unraveling seams.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Great pool floats
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite summer toy. Easy to carry, dries off quickly and very comfortable. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just delivered!! Looks well made. Easy to air up also!
customer_reviews.author: kab

customer_reviews.title: Favorite floatie of everyone who comes over.
customer_reviews.text: I love the hammock. The only quality issue is the cord that constricts ends already broke and had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T. Wilks

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were softer fabric
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very strong plastic smell. The fabric was very rough for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and my hubby and I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. No problem so far. Delivered on time and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Love them but......
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 water hammocks....3 were fine . One had two of the same size floats in the package where the other 3 had one large and one small float to accommodate the different size openings in the hammock. That’s why a 4 and not a 5.....
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the waterpark and they are fantastic. Very convenient to only have to blow up the very ends.
customer_reviews.author: Avido Lettore

customer_reviews.title: Made very well!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for floating in a pool, or on the lake. Very comfortable, and made very well! These are the only floats we use. Easy to take with you, and to store.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't even able to be used!
customer_reviews.text: Three of the four inflatable pillows were sliced and were not even able to be inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lane

customer_reviews.title: Hard to contact seller for issues
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed when my packages arrived and there was only 1 float. Was supposed to be 2 and a air device. Very hard to try to contact seller to resolve. I enjoy the one float, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunatly the product can to me damaged. The seams where not sealed so did not hold the air. I threw away the box so could not return it. Cheaply made. Would not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: karen nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We had a small issue and the seller was quick to respond and fixed the issue promptly!
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY M. MERRYMAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Love my hammock float. Inflates quickly and deflated just as quick. Folds up into my beach bag and is light weight. Very comfortable to float around the pool. Best float ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not really made to lay on it, but is great for just sitting which I have enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Norpus67

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, portable pool float
customer_reviews.text: Love this easily portable float. However, we didn’t realize u need to place the pillows in the sleeve before blowing them up. Works better than we thought it would. Great for a pool and not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and held up all summer
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a family all summer at our beach club. It lasted and would rarely need to be re-inflated.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pool party!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, perfect for our pool party, good size, worked the way suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.text: Pool Float arrived quickly. Quality is good. I was satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline J. Yeomans

customer_reviews.title: We got it, tried to blow it up and ...
customer_reviews.text: We got it, tried to blow it up and it had a hole in it. Threw it in the pool and it sank. Ruined our summer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cayabyab

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: It got a hole in it the second time I used it. Not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mayzak

customer_reviews.title: Water Float
customer_reviews.text: The best , you can stay in the water all day with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Vietri

product_meta.title: FindUWill 2-Pack Premium Swimming Pool Float Hammock, Multi-Purpose Inflatable Hammock (Saddle, Lounge Chair, Hammock, Drifter), Water Hammock Lounge(Colorful and Green)
feature_bullets: Notice on product upgrade Alternation(Only for orders after June 20): 1 the product changes from ( single piece Colorful) to (Colorful and Green package set). If you find that the goods you received do not match the description, please contact us or email. Warranty:All water hammocks sold by FindUWill are covered by warranty. If the pillows leaked, we will exchange it in 30days from purchase!In order to guarantee your rights, please contact us as soon as possible.
Inflatable Water Pillow: Inflatable Water Pillow Set (Header Pillow -Big air bag ,Footer Pillow-Small air bag)*2,, make Float Hammock Portable
Size:51 3/4" x 26",Weight Limit:120kg/265lb.Hammock Float can only hold one people and the total weight could not exceed 120kg/265lb.
Package Included:Float Hammock(Colorful),Float Hammock(Green),Header Pillow*2,Footer Pillow*2,Inflator Pump

Safe Tips: Don't Sleep deeply when floating in the sea! Don’t leave your child unattended, even for a second, near water! ●Float Hammock:The inflated Hammock Lounge can Float you on the water well,like sleeping in a hammock , soft and comfortable. Even if you are not good at swimming, you can also enjoy the water play.
